Blogroll

Author

Paul Simmering

Published

November 24, 2024

I’m a fan of classic blogs. The quality of content is usually higher than on social media and the longer form allows for more depth. In contrast to social media, I never feel like that I’m wasting time when reading good blogs. The open RSS format can be used with many different readers and it’s easy to download things to read offline. If you’re looking for recommendations, here are the blogs that I read regularly, organized by topic.

Machine Learning

Blog Description
dottxt Cutting edge research and practical tools for structured generation with LLMs
Eugene Yan Applied machine learning, data science career advice, and technical writing tips
Hamel Husain Practical LLM engineering from an experienced AI consultant
Simon Willison Developer and open source maintainer sharing close commentary on news relating to AI and other current technologies
Chip Huyen In depth tutorials and deep dives into machine learning concepts
Vicki Boykis Data science, machine learning, and tech industry commentary with a focus on MLOps
Phil Schmid Tutorials and guides focused on transformers and LLMs, especially with Hugging Face and AWS
Hugging Face Latest developments in machine learning, focusing on transformers and open source AI
NVIDIA Updates on AI hardware, software, and research from the leading GPU manufacturer
Sebastian Raschka Deep learning education and research insights from an experienced ML educator
Francois Chollet AI philosophy and technical insights from the creator of Keras
Zvi Mowshowitz Analysis of AI progress and risk from a rationalist perspective
Gwern Branwen In-depth analysis of AI, statistics, psychology and self-experimentation with rigorous research methodology
Near Independent AI research and commentary, as well as nutrition and productivity advice

Data Visualization

Blog Description
Storytelling with Data Practical tips and examples for creating effective data visualizations and presentations
Datawrapper Tutorials and best practices for creating charts and maps, with a focus on journalism
The Pudding Visual essays using data and creative storytelling to explore culture, entertainment, and society

Technology & Programming

Blog Description
Erik Bernhardsson CEO of Modal writing about tech, management and startups
Gergely Orosz In-depth articles about software engineering, tech leadership and the business of technology
Mitchell Hashimoto Founder of HashiCorp sharing thoughts on software development, entrepreneurship and technical architecture
Spotify Engineering Technical blog covering Spotify’s engineering culture, architecture and development practices
David Heinemeier Hansson Creator of Ruby on Rails and founder of Basecamp writing about programming, business and tech industry critique
Ines Montani Co-founder of Explosion AI sharing insights about building developer tools and running a B2B SaaS business
Stephen Wolfram Creator of Mathematica and Wolfram Alpha exploring computation, physics and artificial intelligence
Ben Kuhn CTO of Wave writing thoughtful analyses of technology, productivity and effective altruism

Finance

Blog Description
Patio11 Deep dives into fintech, payments infrastructure, and software business strategy
Lyn Alden Investment research and macroeconomic analysis with focus on long-term value investing
Mr. Money Mustache Personal finance and early retirement through frugality and sustainable living
Gerd Kommer German language blog about evidence-based investing and personal finance
Frugalisten German language blog about personal finance, frugal living and parenting

Business and Entrepreneurship

Blog Description
Paul Graham’s Essays Essays on startup strategy, technology, and philosophy by a co-founder of Y Combinator
Ben Thompson Analysis of tech industry strategy and business models with a focus on aggregation theory
Packy McCormick Long-form analysis of tech companies, startups, and emerging technologies with an optimistic outlook

Design, Communication, Marketing

Blog Description
iA Design agency known for minimalist aesthetics and thoughtful writing about design, typography and digital tools
Seth Godin Daily insights about marketing, leadership and creating meaningful work in the digital age

Data Driven World Improvement

Blog Description
80,000 Hours Research and career advice focused on solving the world’s most pressing problems
Our World in Data Comprehensive data visualizations and research on global issues like poverty, health, and climate change

Personal Development & Productivity

Blog Description
Matt Might Computer science professor sharing advice on academia, productivity and technical writing
Scott Young Learning techniques, self-education experiments and cognitive psychology insights
Tim Ferriss Interviews and articles about performance optimization, business and personal development
Derek Sivers Entrepreneur sharing unconventional wisdom about life, business and decision making
Tynan Nomadic author and entrepreneur shares how he optimizes his life in unusual ways, from a private island with friends to building custom arcade machines
Jeff Kaufman Software engineer writing about effective altruism, personal finance and parenting
Zen Habits Minimalist and zen lifestyle advice from a father of 6

Fun

Blog Description
Wait But Why Long-form illustrated essays explaining complex topics with humor and stick figures by Tim Urban
XKCD Relatable and educational internet comics by Randall Munroe
KIOSK Comics and news from British illustrator and writer Owen Pomery
Aella Sex worker and researcher doing sociological surveys

Are you writing a blog that I might enjoy? Send me an email and let me know! I’ll add it to the list.
